name: Box Fishing
description:
#pointnclick #platformer #leveleditor #adventure #arcade

Welcome to Box Fishing!

Main Game:

Make your way to the top of a tall and strange mountain by making well-placed jumps without falling down again in this game inspired by Getting Over It with Bennet Foddy. Practise your jump placements and distances to beat your best time, and master the mountain to unlock Night-Mode.

Custom Levels:

Once you've mastered the mountain, you can move over to the Level Editor to make your own levels to challenge you and your friends further! Levels can be saved and shared locally as files stored within the 'Levels' folder of the data directory. To import a level, simply drop a level in the Levels folder and open up the Level Editor via the Custom Levels button.

Controls:

Left-click to jump in the direction of the mouse cursor.

Right-click to aim the camera towards the cursor to see your surroundings better.
